You can join the official JZBot chat room [http://webchat.freenode.net/?randomnick=1&channels=jzbot here]. [People This page] has a list of the JZBot developers and the nicknames they use at the JZBot chat room.

For the technically inclined, you can also join the official JZBot chat room at irc.freenode.net, channel #jzbot, using an IRC client such as Pidgin or !ChatZilla.
